reference.title: Primetime DRM interface overview
reference.shortdesc: The key client-side element of the Primetime digital rights management (DRM) system is the DRM Manager. The sample application included with the Android SDK includes a DRMHelper class that demonstrates how to make certain DRM operations easier to implement.

section.p: provides a scalable, efficient workflow to implement content protection in applications. You protect and manage the rights to your video content by creating a license for each digital media file.
Refer to the DRM sample player code included in the package.

Additional relevant API elements:
